reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup**

*RDA*/ Velocity *Coil*/ Single Fused Kanthal Clapton 2×26 core 32 6-Wrap *W*/ 45 
*Wicking*/ Full Cotton *Ω*/0.26       
    
   **Testing**        

*Steep Time*/2 weeks *% Used*/ 5 
*PG/VG* 50-50 *Nic%*/0    

**Mouth Feel**- Heavy and syrupy on the palate light on the nose. Moderately dense give it 4 out of 10.  

**Throat Hit**- Slight 2/10                 

**Flavor Properties**- Cereal like blueberry with a sweet tart snap.

**Relatable Flavors**- Blueberry pancake syrup, reminds me of Boo Berry cereal.     
      
**Off Flavors**- Pretty decent flavor not extremely authentic, but may be much more useful giving authentic blueberry needs a lot of help.

**Position In The Recipe**- This should work well in any fruit base that you were thinking of using blueberry, or a top note in cream basis.

**Pairings**- Dark berries, fruits, bakeries, spices such as cinnamon, creams, and may also work well with tobacco's.

*Please if your opinion differs, or you have another review for this post it in the comments. Will help the master list with multiple reviews in one spot.*
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: Blueberry Extra
